page.title: 15Law and Order (part 2).
page.content: After talking to the mounted police we interviewed the police scramble bike rider. His Honda 250 scramble bike cost 1750 pounds and would be kept for about 5 years. The rider has a nine week training course, and is responsible for cleaning and refuelling the bike. If the bike breaks down, they call a mechanic. The rider wears leather boots with a metal plate in the sole to stop his feet from hurting when standing on the footrests. He also wears padded leather breeches, leather jacket and gloves. His helmet is fitted with headphones and a microphone. The radio is strapped to his chest. The bike travels quicker than a horse but is much noisier. It is used to chase motorcyclists who have ridden into the Chase's motorless zones.
